query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Io vidi già cavalier muover campo, 2 e cominciare stormo e far lor mostra, 3 e talvolta partir per loro scampo;
query.error: **English:** 1 I saw horsemen already move camp, 2 and begin an attack and make their show of force, 3 and sometimes retreat for their safety;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 corridor vidi per la terra vostra, 5 o Aretini, e vidi gir gualdane, 6 fedir torneamenti e correr giostra;
query.error: **English:** 4 I saw runners through your land, 5 O Aretines, and I saw war bands go forth, 6 jousting matches fought and tournaments run;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 quando con trombe, e quando con campane, 8 con tamburi e con cenni di castella, 9 e con cose nostrali e con istrane;
query.error: **English:** 7 sometimes with trumpets and sometimes with bells, 8 with drums and with signals from castles, 9 and with familiar and with foreign things;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 né già con sì diversa cennamella 11 cavalier vidi muover né pedoni, 12 né nave a segno di terra o di stella.
query.error: **English:** 10 never with such a strange signal 11 did I see horsemen or foot soldiers move, 12 nor ships at a sign from land or star.
query.result: 10 na caivam viṣamayā saṃjñayā 11 aśvavāhinam na ca padātinam adṛkṣam calantam, 12 na ca nāvam bhūmeḥ tārāyā vā saṃjñayā.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 Noi andavam con li diece demoni. 14 Ahi fiera compagnia! ma ne la chiesa 15 coi santi, e in taverna coi ghiottoni.
query.error: **English:** 13 We went with the ten demons. 14 Ah, fierce company! But in church 15 with the saints, and in the tavern with the gluttons.
query.result: 13 Vayam daśabhiḥ piśācaih saha yāmaḥ. 14 Aha! Ugraḥ saṅgaḥ! Kintu gṛhe 15 sādhubhiḥ saha, madyapāne ca lobhibhiḥ saha.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 Pur a la pegola era la mia ’ntesa, 17 per veder de la bolgia ogne contegno 18 e de la gente ch’entro v’era incesa.
query.error: **English:** 16 Even though my vision was obscured by the pitch, 17 I was able to see every detail of the bolgia 18 and the people who were tormented within it.
query.result: 16 Api tu tailaparyavasitā me dṛṣṭiḥ āsīt, 17 Sarvasya bolgyāḥ sarvaṃ lakṣaṇam draṣṭum, 18 Tatra sthitānāṃ ca janānāṃ jñātum.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
